Description: The TOS2 mod where the game's hard because you're cursed by the Necronomicon!

CheckboxSettings.Name: Disable Chat Logs
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you can open the game's chat logs

CheckboxSettings.Name: Disable Death Notes
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you can read death notes

CheckboxSettings.Name: Disable Last Wills
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you can read others' last wills after it is displayed

CheckboxSettings.Name: Disable Cause Of Death
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether you can see a player's cause of death

CheckboxSettings.Name: Enable Debugging
CheckboxSettings.Description: Toggles whether the mod's logs will be displayed (keep it off, only turn on if the dev tells you to)
